core.name: Stripe Out White Off-The-Shoulder Dress

description: Are you Stripe Out of ideas for what to wear this weekend on that trip you've got coming up with your friends? Afraid you'll be the odd one out and everyone else will be all cute and trendy and there you'll be ... not trendy and wearing the same old things you've been wearing on this annual getaway for years? Lucky for you, here's the dress you've been searching for. Doesn't matter what else you pack (it does, you'll want to continue to shop with us, we were just being nice) this is the piece that will set you apart from everyone else (that is absolutely true, you will be a Goddess among women). Take that, bad fashion moments of the past! Striped dress features 3/4 sleeve bell sleeves with a partially elastic/open back. Model is wearing a small. • 97% Cotton 3% Spandex • Machine Wash Cold • Lined • Made in the USA
title: Stripe Out White Off-The-Shoulder Dress

core.name: Take The Leap Pink Dress

description: Sometimes the perfect outfit looks so good, it leaves your nerves all aflutter at the thought of how you’ll look. “Is it too sexy?” “Does it stand out too much?” “Will I have to wear Spanx?” But sometimes, to look like a goddess, one simply needs to Take a Leap of faith, and trust in the power of the dress. If it’s the right dress (like this one, for instance), your faith will be prove well placed, and be well rewarded. Sundress has a scalloped neckline with a racerback and invisible zipper with a hook and eye closure. Model is wearing a small. • 100% Polyester • Machine Wash Cold • Lined • Imported

core.name: Sweet Spring Blue Dress

description: Of all the seasons, it's Spring that seems to welcome love unlike the rest. It summons kisses on the front porch, and stargazing on a blanket in the backyard. There's something in the air perhaps, that reminds us how beautiful life can be and makes us want to share that beauty with someone else. So grab that special someone, pack that picnic basket, slip into this perfect Sweet Spring Blue Dress (because it was practically made for you), and go enjoy some spontaneous fun before the moment passes you by. Life's too short to be taken too seriously, and Spring's too short to be taken for granted. Model is wearing a small. • 100% Cotton • Hand Wash Cold • Unlined, faintly sheer • Imported

core.name: Story Meadow Fresh Light Blue Print Maxi Dress

description: When it comes to comfort, there's nothing better than wearing your pajamas all day. Problem is, we're not three years old anymore and that's generally frowned upon in public. Sometimes we get away with this by wearing yoga pants and t-shirts all. the. time. But that's pretty much giving up. We don't want to wave that white flag, now do we? So, here's a great compromise for those of us who love fashion but maybe don't have a whole lot of time to get dolled up, or have small children and can't tackle lots of complicated outfits, or even those who usually wear the really high fashion stuff but need a day off. Meet the best maxi dress ever. It's the melding of fashion and comfort. T-shirt maxi dress features a round neck with two functional pockets. model is wearing a small. • 95% Rayon 5% Spandex • Hand Wash Cold • Unlined • Made in the USA
title: Story Meadow Fresh Light Blue Print Maxi Dress

core.name: For The Romantic Light Blue Off-The-Shoulder Dress

description: When we look for clothes to share with you, we always keep our eyes open for something For the Romantic. Not just the romantic at heart, but women like you, who know deep down that even the princess stories we all grew up with pale in comparison to the wooing you know awaits you. It's not a matter of arrogance to feel that way (we believe wholeheartedly that you deserve it in fact); it's a hard-wiring of the soul to long to be loved back at least as much as you love. So when we came across this dress, and visions of whirlwind romance danced in our heads, we knew you'd feel the same. And when he sees you in it, and is so desperate for your undivided affections that he drops everything, buys a yacht, and whisks you away on an epic romance around the world in an effort to steal your heart, you'll want a dozen more of this gown (exact duplicates; you know, as backups for the next time you want to see that fire behind his eyes that burns for you alone). core.name: Love And Sunshine White Maxi Dress

description: What do you think of when you think of Summer fun? Vacation? Quality time with family and friends? Maybe that annual beach trip with a big bonfire down at the shore with your best friend's family and your's, all the kids splashing in the water, everyone roasting marshmallows and telling stories after having enjoyed the Love And Sunshine during the day, a great dinner out at the old restaurant down by the peer, and more than a few raw oysters. If you ask us, this pretty little Maxi Dress is the perfect accompaniment to this wonderful family tradition. Or any other Summer tradition you might have! But you'll never know if you don't grab yours before we run out. Yup, you guessed it. It's a buy or cry! Maxi dress features a halter neckline with a tie neck and open back. core.name: Strike A Pose Pink Ruffle Midi Dress

description: Instead of thinking about a model posing when you read, 'Strike A Pose,' think more about your significant other being stopped in his tracks when he sees you in this midi dress. Because he will be. And so will any other red-blooded human being who could possibly be attracted to you. And possibly yourself when you finally look in the mirror while you're clad in this. The ruffles, the pink, the halo ... OK, maybe the halo is in your imagination, and in everyone else's, but it'll be there nonetheless. core.name: Best Dressed Ivory And Black Striped Tunic Dress

description: While it might be fun to have someone roll out the red carpet everywhere you went, and someone giving out an award for the Best Dressed for say, every class you attended (mostly because you know that you'd always win), eventually it would get old and you'd long for the good old days of being anonymous. Since you're not in that conundrum and nobody is chasing you down the street with a camera (we assume, anyway) you can always wear this darling little dress and know that were you to be judged in just such a contest you would indeed win and garner all that flattering attention and fame for being so fabulous. It's like playing pretend for grownups. We've got a much bigger toy box and prettier dress-up clothes. Model is wearing a small. Super soft t-shirt style dress features a peplum drop waist and ruffle detail across the front. • 95% Rayon 5% Spandex • Dry Clean Only • Unlined • Made in the USA
title: Best Dressed Ivory And Black Striped Tunic Dress

core.name: Going Girly Floral Print One Shoulder Dress

description: We’re all about girl-empowerment, but you know what? There are just times that call for Going Girly. Whether it’s Dirty Dancing on repeat with a quart of mint chocolate chip, or wearing flowery patterns like only a real woman can, sometimes we just want to feel feminine. Which works out well if we’re trying to land a hottie, since, you know, they’re attracted to women (traditionally speaking). So join us in Going Girly, and express your femininity. This gorgeous one shoulder dress features double ruffle detailing down the front, a slightly flared silhouette, functioning pockets on each side, and a fun floral print throughout. core.name: Here Comes The Fun Embroidered Dress

description: When the party is boring (and let's admit it, if it's thrown via a Pinterest idea, then it probably is) then it's probably time to break out the suit ... and not the giant red, gold, metallic, copyrighted, robotic one that's owned by a huge corporation that would likely sue us for merely mentioning it (though him crashing the party, with his glowing white heart and cool thrusters and ability to fly and party with the rich and famous would likely liven any party--sorry dude whose super hero name rhymes with frying pan, you'll just have to wait). No, we're talking about you and your fabulous self. It's time to break out your 'suit.' And by suit, we mean your Here Comes The Fun Embroidered Dress. It's the dress that will liven any and every party that you walk into.* We don't know why ... the test results have been inconclusive as to why, but every party you come into contact with will (assuming you're awesome) immediately become equally as awesome. core.name: Remember The Name Blue Cold Shoulder Dress

description: Have you ever crushed on a guy immediately, but wondered if he felt the same way when he wandered off from meeting you? Well, upon shaking your hand and catching your eye, we can pretty much promise he'll walk off mumbling, \"Remember The Name, Remember The Name, Remember The Name.\" Yes, instead of your actual name. He'll be that smitten. Good news is, he'll have your name and number in his cell phone because he'll have brains and everything else (you wouldn't give your name and number to anything less than the whole package). core.name: Make Your Getaway Red Floral Print Maxi Dress

description: Oh, there are so many incredible movie-esque scenarios that I contemplated setting this scene with. Great moments of tension and excitement, bravery and a dash of careless passion! But in the end, I trusted my gut and decided that ultimately, it's going to be better if you imagine it yourself--created from scratch. Your mind is going to come up with the absolute best situation possible, the perfect scene. So what's it going to be? What would it be like to Make Your Getaway? And what are you getting away from? The corporate world? The daily routine of seeing the same four walls of your house? Maybe seeing the same town you've seen for way too many years? It's all up to you ... and this darling maxi dress, of course. Maxi dress features a v-neckline with adjustable ruffle straps (up to 2.5\"). Skirt has an invisible back zipper and two slits. Model is wearing a small. • 100% Polyester • Hand Wash Cold • Lined • Imported

On you, it’s simultaneously cutting edge, and elegant, transcending the lower art forms to become something akin to a true masterpiece.
